code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState={ideas:{hyahd:{ideaId:"hyahd",title:"this is my title",color:"bg-red-100"}}};var ideaSlice=createSlice({initialState:initialState,name:"ideas",reducers:{addIdea:function addIdea(state,action){state.ideas[action.payload.id]=action.payload.idea;},removeIdea:function removeIdea(state,action){delete state.ideas[action.payload.id];}}});var _ideaSlice$actions=ideaSlice.actions,addIdea=_ideaSlice$actions.addIdea,removeIdea=_ideaSlice$actions.removeIdea;export{addIdea,removeIdea};export default ideaSlice.reducer;
